author: Ungureanu, Marian (Nokia - RO/Timisoara)
description:
*** DEFAULT TEMPLATE for 2G-3G-4G-5G-SRAN-FDD-TDD-DCM-Micro-Controller common template v1.4.0 (02.07.2021) â€“ PLEASE FILL IT IN BEFORE CREATING A PR AND DO NOT CHANGE / REMOVE ANY SECTION OF THIS TEMPLATE ***

[1. Detail Test Steps:]
Call is started on 5G cell (ENDC B66-N41)
Call is started on 4G cell (B41)
LTE cell is locked (B41) CellID 44832 in logs  call is moved to the second LTE B41 Cell
LTE Cell is unlocked 

[2. Expected Result:]
After LTE cell(B41) CellID 44832 is unlocked, call on 5G(ENDC B66-N41) should not be impacted.

[3. Actual Result:]
After LTE cell(B41) is unlocked, on 5G(ENDC B66-N41) call is dropped for a few seconds and RACH Failure appears, and after several tries RACH Attempt is successful.

[4. Tester analysis:]
The reason we decided to assign this PR directly to RF_RD_L1LOW_OU1 group  because the issue is fairly similar with an old PR626420 from 22R1 opened for CB008145 feature
Now we are testing for feature CB007844 that is the follow up for CB008145 including more AEHC 2CC combos 

The issue is observed after LTE cell is unlocked. The issue is seen on 50+80 2CC combo supported by CB008744.

The issue was not reproduced for lower 2CC combos like 20+30

From the QXDM logs we can see the same 5G RACH failure after LTE cell unlock from webEM
Rach Reason = BEAM_FAILURE
 RACH Result = FAILURE_MSG2_RA_TIMER_EXP
 and then after one other or several attempts  RACH Result = SUCCESS

title: [ST][TDD][CB008744][AIRSCALE+AIRSCALE][RFS][AEHC][eCPRI][ASIK+ABIL][ASIB+ABIC] RACH Failure on 5G after LTE cell unblock
